name: Magikarp

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp.

flavorText: In the distant past, it was stronger than its horribly weak descendants that exist today.

strengths: Flail can do surprising damage when damaged
weaknesses: 30 HP is the lowest in the game
Extremely fragile - dies to almost anything
synergies: Blastoise - Rain Dance for Water Energy
counters: Any attacker - 30 HP is extremely vulnerable

competitiveHistory: Magikarp was notoriously weak, with only 30 HP making it one of the easiest Pokemon to knock out. However, it evolved into the powerful Gyarados, so players would try to protect it long enough to evolve. The challenge of keeping Magikarp alive was part of using the Gyarados line.

rulings.ruling: Flail does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp. With 2 damage counters, it does 20 damage.
If Magikarp has no damage counters, Flail does 0 damage.
